name: Child
description: A sub-activity (sub-component) of a larger activity (the parent)

name: Sibling
description: A sub-activity (sub-component) related to another sub-activity of the same parent

name: Co-funded
description: An activity that receives funding from more than one organisation

name: Third Party
description: A report by another organisation on the same activity (excluding activities reported as part of financial transactions - eg. provider-activity-id - or a co-funded activity using code = 4)
